column2: "Did you know a Mag is considered to be a reflection of its owner's soul?"
"Their abilities change depending on how you take care of them, and you can even train them to attack in different ways."
"A Mag belongs to you and nobody else. That's why it's really important to have a plan in place."
"You know how they say you are what you eat? Well, that's no lie when it comes to Mags. What you feed them really matters!"
"Go ahead, try feeding your Mag something. I guarantee you'll make it a happy Mag!"

"This is an explanation on how to give Mags items.  You can raise the Support Level of stats by giving your Mags items. This will make them grow.  Open the Mags list from the menu to show the information on your Mags. Then select the \"Give Item\" command."

"Choosing \"Give Item\" allows you to give your Mags items to make them grow.  Which Support Levels will increase or decrease depends on the items you give them.  However, please note that once a Mag's energy goes above a certain level, you cannot give it items."
